resources.string: CREATE TABLE GROUP_TABLE ( gID TEXT PRIMARY KEY, gName TEXT , gType INTEGER DEFAULT 1 , gCreatedTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , gDeleted TEXT DEFAULT NULL, gUpdated INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE GROUP_MEMBER ( gmGroupID TEXT, gCreatedTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, gmUserID TEXT , gmDeleted TEXT DEFAULT NULL, gmAdmin TEXT DEFAULT NULL, gmUpdated INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE GROUP_TYPE ( gtID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY , gtText TEXT , gtDescription TEXT)

CREATE TABLE MESSAGE ( mID TEXT PRIMARY KEY , MSenderID TEXT , mCreatedTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP , mUploadedTime TEXT DEFAULT NULL, mDeleted TEXT DEFAULT NULL, mStatusID TEXT , mMessgeTypeID INTEGER DEFAULT 1 , mMessage TEXT , gUpdated INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE MESSAGE_TYPE ( mtID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY , mtText TEXT , mtDescription TEXT)
CREATE TABLE USER ( uID TEXT PRIMARY KEY, uPhoto TEXT, uNick TEXT, uPhoneNumber TEXT, uGCMID TEXT, uEmail TEXT, gUpdated INTEGER DEFAULT 0, uStatusID INTEGER DEFAULT 1)
CREATE TABLE USER_STATUS ( usID TEXT PRIMARY KEY , usText TEXT , usDescription TEXT)
CREATE TABLE RECEIVER ( rMessageID TEXT , rReceiverID TEXT PRIMARY KEY , rRead TEXT DEFAULT NULL, rDeleted TEXT DEFAULT NULL, rPlace TEXT)

CREATE TABLE PLACE ( pID TEXT PRIMARY KEY , pName TEXT, pUserID TEXT, pIcon TEXT, pTypeID INTEGER DEFAULT 1, pWifi TEXT, pWifiConnected TEXT, pGPS TEXT, pGPSRadio REAL, pLAC TEXT, pLACRadio REAL, pMac TEXT, pCreatedTime TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, pDeleted TEXT DEFAULT 0, pUpdated INTEGER DEFAULT 0)
CREATE TABLE CONTACTS_PLACE ( pID TEXT PRIMARY KEY , pName TEXT, pUserID TEXT, pIcon TEXT, pWifi TEXT, pDeleted TEXT NULL)
CREATE TABLE PLACE_TYPE ( ptID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY , ptText TEXT , ptDescription TEXT)
